snippet: Tom Boonen of Belgium used what he called a crazy move to break away from the pack with about 35 miles to go to claim a record-tying fourth victory in the Paris-Roubaix classic.
abstract: Belgian cyclist Tom Boonen claims a record-tying fourth victory in the Paris-Roubaix cycling classic.
lead_paragraph: Tom Boonen of Belgium used what he called a crazy move to break away from the pack with about 35 miles to go to claim a record-tying fourth victory in the Paris-Roubaix classic.
